A filesystem baseline will reveal what files have changed based on a hash 
Can be used to detect modification to critical files such as DLLs
A baseline can also provide information about what files have been created or accessed by reviewing Modification, Access, Change (MAC) times
Reviewing any new installed software could reveal user activity
Alternate data streams can be used to identify files downloaded from the internet or could contain malicious data
Review removable media artifacts for information on devices that have been attached to the system
